subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Peter Sagan of Tinkoff-Saxo has the winning time of 4 hours 6 minutes 46 seconds in the 98.4-mile segment.
snippet: Peter Sagan of Tinkoff-Saxo has the winning time of 4 hours 6 minutes 46 seconds in the 98.4-mile segment.
